name: MY PETS
synopsis: Take care of pets at your home by playing a rich collection of mini games and take them out for walking. The aim is to train your pets so they can enter competitions and become your best friends! Features: Impressive care simulation in 3D Cute and lovely fur shaded animals 4 cats & dogs breeds 16 mini games Stunning setting: luxurious villa with huge garden and pool, beach and shopping city center Animal fashion: dress up the pets! Augmented Reality technology: use the NintendoÂ® AR Card to see your pets come alive!
